name: Nostalgic
description:
What is Nostalgic

Nostalgic is a 2D/3D story game that reminds the player of the moments he spent in his room playing video games.
The game starts with the main character inside his room, in which there will be several consoles that the player will be able to interact with.

Controls:

Inside the Room:

  • WASD - Moves
  • E- interact

Inside the Game Boy:

  • A- Left
  • D- Right
  • Space- jump

Inside the Playstation:

  • Mouse Left Click  - move the cards
  • Mouse Right Click  - zoom in (Cards/creatures)
